resources.string: Jeremiah 29:11 :For I know plans I have for you, declares the Lord, "I have plan harm, plans to give you expected futures".
Revelation 1:8 "I am the alpha and Omega", says the Lord god, who is and, was who is to come the Almighty".
Psalms 100:2 Worship the Lord with gladness, come before him with joyful songs.
Proverbs 14:10 Each heart know its own bitterness, and no one else can share its joy.
Romans 4:7 "Blessed are those transgressions are forgiven, whose sins are covered.
